maleBathroom.text: So the guy of the note... it was you, Guille.

femaleBathroom.text: What are you doing in the girls' bathroom, Guille?
You can't be here, go away.

explainBathroom.text: I need to talk to you. I'm the one who left the note.

ask.text: So now you talk to me.
What about half of the class ignoring me?

explanation.text: That's what I want to talk to you.
I can't talk to you where Alex or any of his friends see us.
He's threatened me to send to my parents a picture of me smoking and drinking.
My parents are very strict and if they discover it I don't know what could happen...they might even send me to another high school.

explanationQuestion.text: But why Alex doesn't want anybody to talk me?

continueExplanation.text: We don't know, he has it in for you since the first day.
Too many people does what he wants, but there're a few of us who have been threatened by him.
It happened something similar last year to Maria, although it was Ana's thing.
She doesn't have friends since then and when someone tries to talk to her...she ignores us.
Well...I just wanted to say sorry, but until Alex stops being upset I won't be able to talk to you.

choices.text: And that's it? Alex gets what he wants?
What about my picture on the board? Was it Alex?

apology.text: But I don't want him to make my life miserable too.

aboutBoard.text: She's really into Alex and if he messes with you, she's going to do the same.
And Jose is his lap dog, unable to think by himself.

talked.text: I'm truly sorry, for real, but my parents cannot know about it.
